ai_art_prompt.template:
Subject: A lone caveman based on the archetype: {goon_name}

Art Style: 90s 2D video game art, reminiscent of retro side-scrolling beat-em-up boss artwork,bold inking, smooth surfaces, heavy shadows and gradients to show form volume.

Anatomy: Hulking, brutish barbarian archetype with exaggerated muscular proportions, a thick neck, and a hunched posture. A stern, intimidating, pugnacious expression. (Vary jaw/teeth: sometimes protruding tusks, sometimes oversized square teeth).

Outfit Instructions:
1. Armor: is a patchwork of {armor}.
2. Head: Give them a unique head feature like {head}.
3. Feet: boots like {feet}.

Setting: {background} environment

Format: 4k resolution. 590x555px dimensions.

background: among the foliage of a dense jungle
cragy mountain ledge with steep cliffs
overgrow ruins of stone with ancient writing and statues
volcanic landscape with lava flows and smoke
forest clearing with tall trees and dappled sunlight
head: skull helmet
dread locks
horned helmet
leather cowel
bone helmet
skull cap
long hair
feathered headdress
animal skull headpiece
reptile skull helmet
tangled hair
